full_summary:
**Tender Notice for Senior Life Cycle Management Specialists**
================================================宕
**Title**
’in English and French: Senior Life Cycle Management Specialists**

**Reference Number**
=================
`cb-9319-16182260`

**Publication Date**
=================
September 22, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
================-----
October 25, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Summary**
-----------

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to submit bids for the
services of four (4) senior life cycle management specialists. The contractors
will provide technical engineering and maintenance services under Stream 5, which
will be executed under the Task and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS)
Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS. The contracts will have a term of
three (3) initial years, with an optional extension of up to two (2) one-year
irrevocable option periods.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The contractors will provide senior life cycle management specialist services,
including:

* Development and implementation of life cycle management plans
* Identification and mitigation of risks
* Ensuring compliance with DND policies and regulations
* Provide technical support and training

**Eligibility**
-------------

Eligible suppliers are those who have been pre-qualified under the TSPS SA.

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Cost-Per-Point

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The tender documents are available on the [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
website.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Marie-Josée Chartrand
marie-josee.chartrand@forces.gc.ca
(819) 575-5817
